feature.name: Damage resistance/vulnerability
feature.shortDescription: The imp has resistance to: cold, and bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered. The imp is immune to fire, and poison damage. It is also immune to the poisoned condition.

feature.name: Shapechanger
feature.shortDescription: The imp can use its action to polymorph into the beast form of a ract, a raven, or a spider, or into its devil form. Its statistics are the same in each form, although its attack is different in some of them. Any equipment it carries is not transformed. If slain, the imp reverts to its devil form.

feature.name: Devil Sight
feature.shortDescription: Magical darkness doesn't impede the imp's darkvision.

feature.name: Magic resistance
feature.shortDescription: The imp has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Sting (Bite in beast form)
action.description: +5 to hit, reach 5ft, one-target. Hit: 5 (1d4+3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Invisibilty
action.description: The imp turns invisible until it attacks or until its concentration ends. Anything the invisible imp is carrying or wearing is invisible as long as it remains in contact with the imp.
